content: make first repeat of triangles round 9 before commencing rotate the scarf to enable construction of the other half of the scarf ensure the scarf is still facing rs note in round 9 all stitches will be worked into the same foundation chain stitch as for round 1 1 round 9 only join yarn into same stitch round 1 3ch was worked from 2 3ch then double_crochet twice into the same chain the 3ch originated from 3 4ch skip 4 chains/stitches and then single_crochet into the next chain/stitch 5th chain/stitch from where the stitches in 2 were worked 4 4ch skip 4 chains/stitches and then double_crochet three times into the next chain/stitch 5th chain/stitch from where the single_crochet in 3 was worked 5 repeat 2 to 3 a total of twelve times 6 4ch skip 4 chain/stitches and then single_crochet into the next foundation round chain 7 4ch skip the remaining 4 foundation round chains and then slip_stitch into the top of the 3ch made in 2 to complete the round round 10 for this entire round work only into the back loop of each previous round stitch 1 3ch then double_crochet into the same stitch the 3ch originated from 2 double_crochet into the next double_crochet from the previous round 3 double_crochet twice into the next double_crochet from the previous round 4 3ch then single_crochet into the next single_crochet from the previous round then 3ch 5 double_crochet twice into the next double_crochet from the previous round then double_crochet into next double_crochet from the previous round then double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round 6 repeat steps 4 to 5 a total of twelve times 7 3ch then single_crochet into the next single_crochet from the previous round then 3ch and then slip_stitch into the top of the 3ch made in 1 to complete the round round 11 for this entire round work only into the back loop of each previous round stitch 1 3ch then double_crochet into the same stitch the 3ch originated from 2 double_crochet into each of the next three stitches from the previous round 3 double_crochet twice into next stitch from the previous round 4 2ch then double_crochet into the next single_crochet from the previous round then 2ch 5 double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round then double_crochet into each of the next 3 dcs from the previous round then double_crochet twice into the next double_crochet from the previous round 6 repeat steps 4 to 5 a total of twelve times 7 2ch then double_crochet into the next single_crochet from the previous round then 2ch and then slip_stitch into the top of the 3ch made in 1 to complete the round round 12 for this entire round work only into the back loop of each previous round stitch 1 3ch then double_crochet into the same stitch the 3ch originated from 2 double_crochet into each of the next two dcs from the previous round 3 double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round 4
